title: The Mountain Club on Loon Resort & Spa in Lincoln, NH Has Been Recognized as a Top-Performing Resort by Travelers on TripAdvisor®
text:
The Mountain Club on Loon Resort & Spa in Lincoln, NH Has Been Recognized as a Top-Performing Resort by Travelers on TripAdvisor®
TripAdvisor® Certificate of Excellence Recipients Represent Top 10 Percent of Businesses Listed on World's Largest Travel Site.
Lincoln, NH, August 31, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Mountain Club on Loon Resort & Spa in Lincoln (NH) has been recognized by TripAdvisor®, the world's largest travel site*, with its coveted 2015 Certificate of Excellence Award. The honor is bestowed only on establishments that consistently achieve outstanding traveler reviews on TripAdvisor®, and is extended to qualifying businesses worldwide. Establishments awarded the Certificate of Excellence represent the upper ranking of hospitality businesses listed on the TripAdvisor® website, with only the top 10 percent receiving this prestigious award.
“Winning the TripAdvisor® Certificate of Excellence Award for the third year running is an honor that reflects the level of expertise demonstrated by our staff of resort professionals,” declares Jeffrey O. McIver, CHA, Mountain Club President and General Manager. “This accomplishment is our customers’ seal of approval, and a vote of confidence for our continued commitment to services dedicated to our guests’ physical and mental recreation.”
When selecting Certificate of Excellence Award winners, TripAdvisor® uses a proprietary algorithm to determine the honorees that is based upon review ratings. Businesses must maintain an overall TripAdvisor® bubble rating of at least four-out-of-five; and have a significant volume of reviews received within the last 12 months. Additional criteria include: timeliness of reviews; operational tenure; and popularity ranking on the TripAdvisor® website. Winners of the award range from one-room bed and breakfasts to 6,000-room hotels; from bakeries to Michelin star restaurants; and from hidden attractions to world-renowned parks and museums.
“TripAdvisor® is pleased to honor exceptional hospitality businesses worldwide for their consistent excellence,” notes Marc Charron, President of TripAdvisor ® for for Business. “The Certificate of Excellence Award gives top-performing establishments around the world the recognition they deserve, based upon feedback from those who matter most: their customers. From Australia to Zimbabwe, we want to applaud exceptional hospitality businesses for offering TripAdvisor travelers a great customer experience.”
The Mountain Club on Loon is a four-season, luxury condominium resort hotel located in Lincoln, NH, at Loon Mountain, a Boyne Resort. It is the only slopeside ski-in and ski-out resort hotel in New Hampshire providing a full complement of guest services, and includes the new Hancock Meetings & Events Center. The resort is comprised of 234 individually-owned fractional ownership units, offering club rooms, family-sized suites and full-kitchens. On-site amenities include: The Black Diamond Pub; and Viaggio Spa and Health Club. The resort is affiliated with the two largest worldwide vacation exchange organizations: Interval International and Resort Condominiums International. For more information contact: info@mtnclub.com; 800-229-7829; 90 Loon Mountain Rd., Lincoln, NH 03251.
About TripAdvisor
TripAdvisor® is the world's largest travel site*, enabling travelers to plan and have the perfect trip. TripAdvisor offers trusted advice from real travelers and a wide variety of travel choices and planning features with seamless links to booking tools. TripAdvisor branded sites make up the largest travel community in the world, with more than 200 million unique monthly visitors**, and over 100 million reviews and opinions covering more than 2.5 million accommodations, restaurants and attractions. The sites operate in 30 countries worldwide, including China under daodao.com. TripAdvisor also includes TripAdvisor for Business, a dedicated division that provides the tourism industry access to millions of monthly TripAdvisor visitors.
*Source: comScore Media Metrix for TripAdvisor Sites, worldwide, March 2015
**Source: Google Analytics, worldwide data, April 2015
